properties.name: CustomTags
properties.description: Key-Value pair storage. Any provider of this event schema is allowed to send additional values in this property.

properties.name: EntityId
properties.description: The identifier for the entity (title, player, etc) to which this event applies.

properties.name: EntityType
properties.description: The type of entity (player, title, etc.) to which this event applies. If PlayFab is meant to take action on this entity, then the EntityType must be either 'player', 'character', or 'title'. It is required    that any entity type that PlayFab does not currently parse should be prepended with a namespace (like 'com.mygame.guild') as PlayFab may begin to parse root entities at any time.

properties.name: EventId
properties.description: PlayFab-assigned unique identifier for this event.

properties.name: EventNamespace
properties.description: The assigned namespacing for this event. For example: 'com.myprogram.ads'

properties.name: History
properties.description: The history of events associated with this event. This is set in cases where an event has generated children events via a trigger action.

properties.name: Reserved
properties.description: Reserved exclusively for PlayFab internal use.

properties.name: Source
properties.description: The name of the source of this PlayStream event; will be PlayFab if the event originated from us.

properties.name: SourceType
properties.description: The type of source of this event (PlayFab partner, other backend, or from the PlayFab API).

properties.name: Timestamp
properties.description: The time (in UTC) associated with this event.

properties.name: ParentEventId
properties.description: The ID of the previous event that caused this event to be created by hitting a trigger.

properties.name: ParentTriggerId
properties.description: The ID of the trigger that caused this event to be created.

properties.name: TriggeredEvents
properties.description: If true, then this event was allowed to trigger subsequent events in a trigger.
